products.title: Cascade Rain Shell - Men's
products.body_html:
Built for misty mornings and surprise squalls, the Cascade Rain Shell keeps you dry without feeling clammy.

  • 2.5-layer waterproof/breathable fabric
  • Helmet-compatible hood
  • Packable into its own pocket

Weight: 330g. Material: 100% recycled nylon ripstop.

images.alt: Cascade Rain Shell - Men's - Great Outdoors Co.

image.alt: Cascade Rain Shell - Men's - Great Outdoors Co.

products.body_html:

Waterproof rating: 15K. Weight: 310g. Material: 100% recycled nylon.
